Name: Awakened Mind
Description: Telepathically connect with objects for both offense and defense.  Mentally distract your enemies.

Defend.Name: Control Stone
Defend.Action_String: <User> connects telepathically with a pebble, buffing their attack by 5 for 3 rounds.

Defend.Name: Stone Block
Defend.Action_String: <User> sets the stone to orbit their head, preparing to block for 5 damage.

Attack.Name: Hurl Rock
Attack.Action_String: <User> hurls their stone at <Target>, dealing <Damage> damage.

Attack Crit.Name: Depress
Attack Crit.Action_String: <User> depresses the thoughts of <Target> in a moment of weakness.  <Target> will take <Damage> damage for 3 rounds.

Special.Name: Distract
Special.Action_String: <User> projects a loud, distracting bang into the mind of <Target>, debuffing <Target>'s attack by 5 for 4 rounds.
